itinerary_summary: A delightful 3-day getaway to Cameron Highlands, Malaysia, filled with culinary experiences, breathtaking scenery, and romantic explorations of one of the country's most famous hill stations.

day_by_day_itineraries.summary: Arrival and exploration of the local cuisine and attractions in Cameron Highlands.

activities.description: Start your day with a hearty breakfast featuring local dishes and freshly brewed coffee.
Explore the breathtaking views and learn about the tea-making process at this iconic plantation.

activities.activity_name: Lunch at The Dining Room, Cameron Highlands Resort
activities.description: Indulge in a sumptuous lunch amidst the lush greenery of the resort.
Walk through the enchanted Mossy Forest and enjoy the unique flora and cool climate.

day_by_day_itineraries.summary: A day filled with local attractions, savoring traditional Malaysian cuisine, and visiting markets.

activities.description: Delight in traditional Malaysian breakfast options at this beloved local cafe.

activities.activity_name: Visit the Strawberry Farm, Big Red Strawberry Farm
activities.description: Pick your own strawberries and sample delicious strawberry treats in this family-friendly farm.
Experience the local flavors by tasting satay and fresh produce from local vendors.
Stroll through Tanah Rata, visit local shops and cafes, and embrace the town's charm.

day_by_day_itineraries.summary: Wrap up your adventure with more culinary highlights and scenic views before departure.

activities.description: Enjoy a delicious breakfast with a stunning view of the hills.
Discover the history of Cameron Highlands through unique exhibits at this engaging museum.

activities.activity_name: Lunch at the Cameron Valley Tea House 2
activities.description: Savor more tea and snacks while overlooking the beautiful tea gardens.

activities.activity_name: Shopping for Souvenirs at Brinchang Night Market
activities.description: Pick up souvenirs and enjoy local street food at one of the local markets.
